message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $140. It's a great deal, and I'm confident you'll be happy with it.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. I'm willing to come down to $135.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to go down to $130 again?
Bob, I value your interest in the product. I'm willing to go down to $133. It's a great price, and I'm confident you won't regret it.  Let's close this deal!
I'm getting close, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  I'm willing to make one final concession and offer the product for $131.  This is a very fair price, and I'm confident you'll be happy with this deal. Let's finalize this.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
